Technology innovation & adult learning

Making / Learning / Work is an adult learning innovation project hosted at the MIT Media Lab

In the US, 36 Million adults have low basic literacy and numeracy skills. Many are stuck in low-paying jobs or unemployment. This is a challenge not just for the individuals and families directly affected, but for the US economy as a whole. “Learning” is the most promising pathway towards family-supporting employment and better futures. [Read More]
